verses.t: My{G3450} brethren{G80}, be{G1096} not{G3361} many{G4183} masters{G1320}, knowing{G1492} that{G3754} we shall receive{G2983} the greater{G3173} condemnation{G2917}.

For{G1063} in many things{G4183} we offend{G4417} all{G537}. If{G1487} any man{G5100} offend{G4417} not{G3756} in{G1722} word{G3056}, the same{G3778} is a perfect{G5046} man{G435}, and able{G1415} also{G2532} to bridle{G5468} the whole{G3650} body{G3588}.

Behold{G2400}, we put{G906} bits{G3588} in{G1519} the horses'{G3588} mouths{G3588}, that{G4314} they{G846} may obey{G3982} us{G2254}; and{G2532} we turn about{G3329} their{G846} whole{G3650} body{G3588}.Unsure about the tagging of preposition "pros".

Behold{G2400} also{G2532} the ships{G3588}, which though{G5607} they be so great{G5082}, and{G2532} are driven{G1643} of{G5259} fierce{G4642} winds{G417}, yet are they turned about{G3329} with{G5259} a very small{G1646} helm{G4079}, whithersoever{G3699} the governor{G3588} listeth{G1014}.

Even{G2532} so{G3779} the tongue{G3588} is{G2076} a little{G3398} member{G3196}, and{G2532} boasteth great things{G3166}. Behold{G2400}, how great{G2245} a matter{G5208} a little{G3641} fire{G4442} kindleth{G381}!

And{G2532} the tongue{G3588} is a fire{G4442}, a world{G3588} of iniquity{G3588}: so{G3779} is{G2525} the tongue{G3588} among{G1722} our{G2257} members{G3588}, that it defileth{G4695} the whole{G3650} body{G3588}, and{G2532} setteth on fire{G5394} the course{G3588} of nature{G3588}; and{G2532} it is set on fire{G5394} of{G5259} hell{G3588}.

For{G1063} every{G3956} kind{G5449} of beasts{G2342}, and{G2532} of birds{G4071}, and{G5037} of serpents{G2062}, and{G2532} of things in the sea{G1724}, is tamed{G1150}, and{G2532} hath been tamed{G1150} of mankind{G442}:
But{G1161} the tongue{G1100} can{G1410} no{G3762} man{G444} tame{G1150}; it is an unruly{G183} evil{G2556}, full{G3324} of deadly{G2287} poison{G2447}.

Therewith{G846} bless we{G2127} God{G3588}, even{G2532} the Father{G3962}; and{G2532} therewith{G846} curse we{G2672} men{G3588}, which{G3588} are made{G1096} after{G2596} the similitude{G3669} of God{G2316}.
Out of{G1537} the same{G846} mouth{G4750} proceedeth{G1831} blessing{G2129} and{G2532} cursing{G2671}. My{G3450} brethren{G80}, these things{G5023} ought{G5534} not{G3756} so{G3779} to be{G1096}.
Doth{G3385} a fountain{G3588} send forth{G1032} at{G1537} the same{G846} place{G3692} sweet{G1099} water and{G2532} bitter{G4089}?

Can{G1410} the fig tree{G4808}, my{G3450} brethren{G80}, bear{G4160}olive berries{G1636}? either{G2228} a vine{G288}, figs{G4810}? so{G3779} can no{G3762} fountain{G4077} both yield{G4160} salt{G252} water{G5204} and{G2532} fresh{G1099}.

Who{G5101} is a wise man{G4680} and{G2532} endued with knowledge{G1990} among{G1722} you{G5213}? let him shew{G1166} out of{G1537} a good{G2570} conversation{G391} his{G846} works{G3588} with{G1722} meekness{G4240} of wisdom{G4678}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} ye have{G2192} bitter{G4089} envying{G2205} and{G2532} strife{G2052} in{G1722} your{G5216} hearts{G3588}, glory{G2620} not{G3361}, and{G2532} lie{G5574} not against{G2596} the truth{G3588}.
This{G3778} wisdom{G3588} descendeth{G2718} not{G3756} from above{G509}, but{G235} is earthly{G1919}, sensual{G5591}, devilish{G1141}.UNSURE: Tagging of "esti" with "katerchomai"
For{G1063} where{G3699} envying{G2205} and{G2532} strife{G2052} is, there{G1563} is confusion{G181} and{G2532} every{G3956} evil{G5337} work{G4229}.

But{G1161} the wisdom{G4678} that is{G2076} from above{G509} is first{G4412} pure{G53}, then{G1899} peaceable{G1516}, gentle{G1933}, and easy to be intreated{G2138}, full{G3324} of mercy{G1656} and{G2532} good{G18} fruits{G2590}, without partiality{G87}, and{G2532} without hypocrisy{G505}.
And{G1161} the fruit{G2590} of righteousness{G3588} is sown{G4687} in{G1722} peace{G1515} of them{G3588} that make{G4160} peace{G1515}.
